q: Match alerting types with triggers:
What does this code output for z-score anomaly detection?
c:
import statistics
values = [100, 102, 98, 105, 95, 200, 101]
mean = statistics.mean(values)
std = statistics.stdev(values)
z_scores = [(v - mean) / std for v in values]
anomalies = sum(1 for z in z_scores if abs(z) > 2)
print(f'Anomalies: {anomalies}')
